description.narrative: The Project, in the middle of Heilongjiang province, is designed to promote sustainable economic growth by improving the Jixi-Nehe highway, a key trunk highway in the northeast. The Project will comprise (i) the upgrading of 428 km of the Jixi-Nehe highway, from class III or unclassified to class II or I; (ii) the improvement of rural link roads, totaling 170 km, to strengthen the integrated network in the project area; (iii) rural road maintenance; and (iv) equipment, consulting services, capacity development, and land acquisition and resettlement.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally friendly road transport system developed in Heilongjiang

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Vehicle operating costs for a car reduced from CNY1.48 per vehicle per km in 2005 to CNY1.23 in 2015 (2005 constant prices)

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally friendly road transport system developed in Heilongjiang

title.narrative: Travel time between Linkou and Baiquan reduced from 12.5 hours in 2005 to 7.5 hours in 2015

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally friendly road transport system developed in Heilongjiang

title.narrative: Villages with paved road access increased from 25% of the total in 2005 to 55% by 2010

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally friendly road transport system developed in Heilongjiang

title.narrative: Bus service coverage increased from 80% of townships in 2004 to 100% by 2015

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally friendly road transport system developed in Heilongjiang

title.narrative: The number of serious road accidents and fatalities in the project area reduced by 20% by 2015.

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environmentally friendly road transport system developed in Heilongjiang
